description:
Welcome to one of Udemy's best and most in depth courses on how to become a wedding videographer. Have you ever thought about starting a wedding videography business? Taught by a wedding videographer who knows all the tricks of the trade, this course will get you started in a lucrative market. Phil went from charging $250 per wedding to over $2500 in less than 12 months! He'll teach you how to do the same!

With over 4 hours of great content, you'll learn:

  • How to get your first wedding.
  • Shooting a wedding
  • Editing a wedding video
  • Creating a wedding business website
  • and so much more!

The course is easy to follow in short segments. All you need is an entrepreneurial spirit! Learn at your own pace. Phil is available if you have any questions.
title: Wedding Videography: Complete Guide to Wedding Videography
